body:
Hi all,

I,v problem with not subtracting the glazings from walls in with addHBGLZ in the attachment file. What's wrong in my file?

replies.body:
Salam Arbab! :)



You forgot to internalize the glazing geometry so I can't reproduce the problem. Also please put a note inside the file where you exactly have the issue.



Mostapha

Ali,



I updated to the latest version and put in my own geometry and everything seems to be fine.  If it's a problem with your geometry, you need to make sure that you internalize the brep geometry or provide your Rhino 3dm file.



-Chris
